entries.text: Arkham sucumbiu à terrível vingança de Umôrdhoth.
o Sacerdote Carniçal ainda está vivo.
sua casa foi queimada até o chão.
sua casa ainda está de pé.
Lita foi forçada a encontrar outros para ajudar sua causa.
os investigadores entregaram Lita Chantler como sacrifício para Umôrdhoth.
o ritual de invocação de Umôrdhoth foi quebrado.
o bando de O’Bannion tem uma dívida para acertar com os investigadores.
os investigadores fecharam a fenda da realidade.
Earl Sawyer sobreviveu ao Legado de Dunwich.
os investigadores falharam ao recuperar o Necronomicon.
os investigadores falharam ao salvar os estudantes.
os investigadores resgataram o Dr. Francis Morgan.

os investigadores resgataram Dr. Henry Armitage.

os investigadores atrasaram no caminho até Dunwich.
os investigadores, colocaram Silas Bishop fora de sua miséria.
Nenhuma nenhuma cria escapou na selva.
os investigadores mantiveram a posse do Necronomicon.
os investigadores ficaram inconscientes por vários horas.
você avisou os habitantes da cidade.
os investigadores resgataram o Professor Warren Rice.
Professor Warren Rice sobreviveu ao Legado de Dunwich.
Yog-Sothoth rompeu a barreira entre os mundos, e tornou-se um com toda a realidade.
Yog-Sothoth rasgou em dois a barreira entre os mundos, e tornou-se um com toda a realidade.
Zebulon Whateley sobreviveu ao Legado de Dunwich.

entries.text: the investigators convinced Dyer to allow the expedition.
the investigators did not believe Dyer's report.
The team discovered an ancient vault.
Dr. Kensler has confronted her demons.
Dr. Kensler is on the verge of understanding.
Dr. Kensler is sharing her research with you.
Dr. Kensler understands the true nature of the miasma.
Dr. Sinha has confronted her demons.
the nameless madness is contained safely within its host… for now.
The team photographed the astronomical charts.
the investigators scouted the city outskirts.

the team studied the mural carvings.
the survivors of the expedition were:

the team found the hidden tunnel.
the team was guided to the hidden tunnel.
the truth of the mirage eludes you.

entries.feminine_text: #name# starts with 1 clue (from the token bank).

supplies.name: Sticky Goop
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in a subterranean swamp.

supplies.name: Mysterious Scepter
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in the throne room.

supplies.name: Key of Eztli
supplies.description: The Key of Eztli.

supplies.name: Gasoline
supplies.description: Enough for a long journey bycar.

supplies.name: Provisions
supplies.description: Food and water for one person. A must-have for any journey.

supplies.name: Medicine
supplies.description: To stave off disease, infection, or venom.

supplies.name: Pendant
supplies.description: Useless, but fond memories bring comfort to travelers far from home.

supplies.name: Canteen
supplies.description: Can be refilled at streams and rivers.

supplies.name: Compass
supplies.description: Can guide you when you are hopelessly lost.

supplies.name: Pickaxe
supplies.description: For breaking apart rocky surfaces.

supplies.name: Blanket
supplies.description: For warmth at night.

supplies.name: Chalk
supplies.description: For writing on rough stone surfaces.

supplies.name: Binoculars
supplies.description: To help you see faraway places.

supplies.name: Pocketknife
supplies.description: Too small to be used as a reliable weapon, but easily concealed.

supplies.name: Torches
supplies.description: Can light up dark areas, or set sconces alight.

supplies.name: Rope
supplies.description: Several long coils of strong rope. Vital for climbing and spelunking.

supplies.name: Map
supplies.description: Unmarked for now, but with time, you may be able to map out your surroundings.

entries.text: Cnidathqua recuou para tratar de suas feridas.

the ritual at sea was halted.
o Rougarou continua assombrando o bayou.
o Rougarou é destruído, e a maldição foi quebrada.
o Rougarou escapou e você abraçou a maldição.
you are aware of Xzharah’s plans.
the curse of slumber was lifted.
the Day of Reckoning is coming.

entries.text: Agent Harper's mission is complete… but at what cost?
Zadok Allen is out for blood.
Brian Burnham is out for blood.
the Deep Ones have flooded the Earth.
Robert Friendly is out for blood.
the gateway to Y’ha-nthlei recognizes you as its rightful keeper
Othera Gilman is out for blood.
the guardian of Y’ha-nthlei is dispatched.
the headdress was brought to the lighthouse.
the idol was brought to the lighthouse.
Innsmouth was consumed by the rising tide.
Joyce Little is out for blood.
the investigators made it safely to their vehicles.
the mantle was brought to the lighthouse.
Barnabas Marsh is out for blood.
the plot of the Deep Ones was thwarted.
the investigators possess a map of Y'ha-nthlei.
the investigators possess the key to Y'ha-nthlei.
the investigators reached Falcon Point after sunrise.
the investigators reached Falcon Point before sunrise.
the riches of the deep are destroyed… but at what cost?
the riches of the deep are lost forever.
the Terror of Devil Reef is dead.
the Terror of Devil Reef is still alive.
a battle with a horrifying devil
an encounter with a secret cult
Alice perished and Wonderland has been lost forever.
Gurathnaka and its shadows consumed the earth.
Gurathnaka and its shadows were banished from Arkham.
the Hare and  Hatter thoroughly enjoyed your company.
the Hare and the Hatter were cast into the shadows.
the Hare couldn't cope with the Hatter's death.
the Hare, Hatter, and Dormouse were consumed by shadows.
the Hatter couldn't cope with the Hare's death.
the Jabberwock still haunts the Tulgey Wood.
one of the Tweedles learned about the cost of war.
the Queen destroyed the shadows in a fit of rage.
the Queen's castle was consumed by shadows.
the investigators separated Alice's dreams from the real world.
the shadows grow stronger with each passing moment.
the shadows maintain their grip on Alice's dreams.
the shadows have been weakened by Wonderland's instability.
the Snark and its hunters were never met with again.
the investigators took the Jabberwock's head.
the Tweedles learned that there are worse things than fighting each other.
the Tweedles perished in their bloody battle.
the Tweedles' war was brought to an end.
the Walrus and the Carpenter ate their last meal.
the Walrus and the Carpenter have lost their appetites.
the Walrus and the Carpenter were completely obliterated.
the investigators went down the rabbit hole.
the investigators went through the looking glass.
the White King celebrates a grand victory.
the White King was slain by the red pieces.
the White Knight has fallen in battle to the Red Queen.
the White Knight revels in your victory over the Red Queen.
the White Rabbit was consumed by shadows.
the White Rabbit survived the monster's attack.
The Gryphon and the Mock Turtle
The Gryphon and the Mock Turtle
the investigators became sentinels of the mist.
the investigators did not find the ritual site.
the investigators have earned Bárðr's trust.
an investigator found the chest in the lake.
the investigators found the ritual site.
an investigator knows where the silver is.
the investigators have mapped the Golden Circle.
the investigators are on their own.
an investigator forced open the frozen chest.
an investigator retrieved the eerie pole.
an investigator uncovered the split skull.

entries.text: you are allied with the Mi-Go.
#name# was caught in the supernova's blast.
you couldn't save the crew of the Nostalgia II.
Elbrus Station has been fully stabilized.
Elbrus Station has been lost in the quantum realm.
you entered the Virtual Dreamlands by your own means.
the investigators have finally escaped Hastur's grasp and prevented him from escaping his prison.
you fully restored the sanity of K2-PS187.
Hastur and Tassilda are imprisoned in Carcosa once more, and the universe vanquished the inevitable… For now.
you have witnessed the primordial chaos.
you have witnessed the unconscious pandemonium.
Hope was shielded from the blast.
you know of the Abjuration of the Throne.
#name# lived the remainder of their days, on Paradise.
#name# lived the remainder of their days, with Hope.
the Mi-Go safely returned to their home world.
the Nostalgia II has been saved.
you are not in good standing with the Mi-Go.
you partially restored the sanity of K2-PS187.
the realm of Carcosa overtook our universe, and Tassilda rules over the black stars.
you have returned to the palaces of Dim Carcosa.
the sun went supernova and wiped out most of the solar system.
you were transported to the Virtual Dreamlands by Maja.
you are trapped in a virtual nightmare.
the investigators are trapped within Carcosa.
the UCC escaped to another galaxy.
you have uncovered the cultist's inhuman methods.
you have watched the performance of Heir to Carcosa.
you have rescued the remaining crew of the Nostalgia II.
